Title: Paths of Glory
Writer: Stanley Kubrick (screenplay), Calder Willingham (screenplay), Jim Thompson (screenplay), Humphrey Cobb (based on the novel "Paths of Glory" by)
Actors: Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker, Adolphe Menjou, George Macready
Plot: The futility and irony of the war in the trenches in WWI is shown as a unit commander in the French army must deal with the mutiny of his men and a glory-seeking general after part of his force falls back under fire in an impossible attack.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 7 wins & 3 nominations.
